answers: We offer wellbeing appointments, mental‑health guidance, and confidential support.
You can speak with a welfare officer 1‑to‑1 and access self‑help resources.
phrases: i need to talk to someone

answers: We can arrange a confidential welfare appointment for you.
Would you prefer an online session or to come into the office?
Online appointments are available Mon–Fri. We’ll send a Teams link.
Great — I’ll book an online session and email the details.
In‑person appointments are held at the welfare office.
Shall I confirm an in‑person booking for you?
Appointments are available Monday–Friday between 9am and 4pm.
Morning or afternoon usually works — what do you prefer?
Your appointment is booked. A welfare officer will contact you shortly.
Booked — look out for your confirmation email.
Here are mental‑health resources on stress, resilience, and self‑care.
I can also send a digital resource pack if you’d like.
Workshops run weekly and cover stress, resilience, and emotional wellbeing.
Say 'sign me up' and I’ll register you and send confirmation.
If you are in immediate danger, contact emergency services. I can also connect you to the welfare team now.
You're not alone — urgent support is available.
You can contact the welfare team by phone or email.
Would you like the phone number or email?
Call the welfare team on: 01234 567890
Email the welfare team: welfare@company.com
You can email: welfare@company.com
We can help with financial wellbeing, hardship support, and emergency assistance.
If you’d like, I can share the application form and required documents.
Hardship support is available for urgent financial difficulty.
I can guide you through eligibility and how to apply.
You can apply via the internal financial support form. I can also help you complete it.
Tell me if you want the form link or help with documents.
Open the financial form: https://company.com/financial-form — I can guide you through it.
We’ll cover your details, situation, and any supporting evidence.
You may need proof of financial need, ID, and recent payslips. For adjustments, medical evidence may help.
If you’re unsure what to upload, I can check with you now.
I can help with annual leave, sick leave, and reporting sickness.
Would you like the policy or help submitting a request?
The leave policy covers annual leave, sick leave, and welfare leave.
I can help you find the right section or submit a request.
Submit leave requests via the HR portal. I can help if you can’t access it.
Tell me if you want portal help or policy info.
Log in with your staff credentials. If you have trouble, I can help troubleshoot.
Shall we check your access or reset your password?
We support ergonomic equipment, flexible hours, and reasonable adjustments.
I can help you request adjustments or connect you to Occupational Health.
Adjustment requests can be made via HR; medical evidence may help.
Would you like help contacting Occupational Health or reviewing documents?
Occupational Health can assess needs and recommend adjustments.
I can share the OH email if you want.
You can contact Occupational Health at: oh@company.com
Email OH at: oh@company.com for assessments and recommendations.
I can help with IT issues like login problems, MFA, and portal access.
Shall we try a password reset or check your system status?
Let’s fix your login. We can reset your password or check your MFA.
First step: try a password reset. If that fails, I’ll escalate.
Reset your password at https://reset.company.com and try again.
Use the reset portal; if you still can’t sign in, we’ll escalate.
Contact IT support at: it@company.com
Email IT: it@company.com for technical assistance.
Having MFA trouble? Check your authenticator app time sync or try an SMS code.
We can re-register your MFA device if needed.
Your account may be locked after multiple failed attempts. We can unlock it.
I can guide you through unlocking or escalate to IT.
To unlock: wait 15 minutes or request an unlock via the IT portal; then try again.
If urgent, email IT and ask for an immediate unlock.
If multiple people are affected, it may be a system outage. Try again in a few minutes.
We can check service status or clear cache and retry.
Try: clear cache, close/reopen browser, or use an incognito window, then log in again.
Switch browsers (Edge/Chrome) and retry the portal.
You can report a workplace concern confidentially to HR or welfare.
Tell me if this is about conduct, safety, bullying/harassment, or something else.
A formal grievance can be raised if informal resolution isn’t suitable.
I can guide you through the process and paperwork.
Dignity at Work covers respectful behaviour, equality, and inclusion.
If you’ve experienced inappropriate behaviour, we can advise next steps.
Bullying/harassment should be reported. We’ll support you through the process.
We can discuss informal resolution or a formal complaint.
Whistleblowing concerns can be raised confidentially under the policy.
I can signpost how to report safely and appropriately.
We can support with performance concerns, objectives, and development plans.
Coaching, training, and wellbeing support are available.
A Return to Work conversation supports your transition back after absence.
We can discuss phased return, adjustments, and support.
A fit note from your GP may be required for certain sickness durations.
We can review when a fit note is needed and what it should include.
An Occupational Health referral can assess your needs and recommend adjustments.
I can help arrange a referral if appropriate.
Flexible working may include adjusted hours, location, or pattern of work.
We can explore informal and formal options.
Formal flexible working requests are submitted via HR, with rationale and impact.
I can signpost the form and guidance.
Parental leave (including maternity, paternity, adoption, shared parental) has specific eligibility and notice periods.
I can help you find the right policy and next steps.
Maternity and paternity leave details include pay, duration, and notification requirements.
We can review timelines and forms together.
Bereavement leave may be available; we’ll handle your request sensitively.
I can explain the process and how to submit a request.
For pay and pensions queries, I can signpost policy and contacts.
Tell me if this is about payslips, deductions, or pension options.
For payslip questions (tax code, deductions, overtime), we can review together.
If needed, I’ll signpost to payroll.
I can help with travel and expense guidance, including how to claim work-related costs.
Let me know if you need the form, policy details, or help submitting a claim.
The expenses policy covers travel, meals, mileage, and receipts requirements.
I can highlight key points or provide the full policy document.
You can submit expenses via the HR portal or using the digital claim form.
Make sure to upload receipts and mileage logs if needed.
Travel support includes mileage reimbursement, public transport costs, and necessary travel bookings.
Let me know if you need guidance or the travel policy.
If you’re experiencing housing difficulties, we can signpost external housing support services.
If it’s urgent or linked to wellbeing, I can help connect you to the welfare team.
Community support includes local services such as housing, foodbanks, debt advice, and wellbeing hubs.
Tell me what type of support you need and I’ll signpost appropriately.
Foodbanks can provide emergency food and essentials. I can signpost your nearest options.
Would you like me to look up local support?
We can signpost free debt advice and budgeting support.
If money worries are affecting your wellbeing, wellbeing support is available too.
If you are experiencing domestic abuse, support is available. If you’re in immediate danger, contact emergency services.
I can signpost confidential help and connect you to welfare if needed.
Safeguarding concerns should be reported immediately. I can help signpost who to contact.
If someone is at risk, please contact the safeguarding team or emergency services.
Your information is handled confidentially and only shared if there is a serious risk.
I can explain how confidentiality works in welfare and HR processes.
Data protection is important—your information is stored securely and used appropriately.
I can explain how we handle your data and your rights.
If you need to reschedule, we can change your wellbeing appointment or book a new slot.
Tell me if you prefer morning or afternoon.
Your appointment can be cancelled if you can’t attend. We can book another time if needed.
Let me know if you'd like to rebook.
I can request a call back from the welfare team.
Let me know the best time for them to contact you.
If this needs escalation, I can connect you with the welfare or HR teams.
Tell me if you'd like immediate contact or written guidance.
I’m not sure what you mean, but I can help with wellbeing, HR, financial support, adjustments, or contacting welfare.
Can you rephrase or choose one of these options?
Hi! How can I support you today?
Hello! What would you like help with?
You’re welcome! I'm here if you need anything else.
No problem — happy to help.
Goodbye! Take care and reach out anytime you need support.
Speak soon — I'm here whenever you need help.
Would you like to give feedback about this support?
I can record your feedback and pass it to the welfare team.
Thanks for your feedback — it helps us improve the service.
Your feedback has been noted.
We have policies on HR, wellbeing, adjustments, leave, and conduct.
Tell me which policy you’d like to know about.
If you'd like, I can guide you on how to raise something with your manager.
Is this about performance, wellbeing, or workplace concerns?
Our Equality, Diversity & Inclusion (EDI) approach promotes fair treatment and respect for all.
I can signpost the EDI policy and ways to get support or raise concerns.
We can support disabled colleagues with reasonable adjustments and tailored guidance.
I can help you request adjustments and connect with Occupational Health.
Support for neurodivergent colleagues (e.g., ADHD, autism, dyslexia) can include adjustments, coaching, and tools.
We can explore environmental, task, and communication adjustments.
Menopause support may include adjustments, flexible working, and wellbeing guidance.
I can signpost the guidance and help you discuss options.
If you have caring responsibilities, we can explore flexible working and support options.
I can signpost leave, adjustments, and wellbeing resources for carers.
We can signpost childcare support information and discuss flexible options where appropriate.
If you need time off or flexible arrangements, I can guide you.
Confidential support is available for alcohol or substance concerns, with signposting to specialist services.
If you’re in immediate risk, please seek urgent help.
If gambling is causing difficulties, we can signpost free specialist help and provide wellbeing support.
You’re not alone — support is available and confidential.
Better sleep support includes routines, environment changes, and stress reduction.
I can share practical tips and resources to improve sleep.
Here are stress management tips: breathing techniques, time‑boxing, and short movement breaks.
Would you like a resource pack or a wellbeing appointment?
Mindfulness resources include short practices you can do during the day.
I can provide audio guides and simple routines.
Workplace mediation can help resolve conflicts informally and constructively.
I can explain how mediation works and next steps.
Let’s look at options to resolve a workplace conflict — informal steps, mediation, or formal routes.
I can help you consider next steps based on your situation.
We can signpost learning resources and training opportunities relevant to your role.
If this links to performance goals, I can help you plan next steps.
Career development support includes objectives, learning, and mentoring.
Let’s map options that fit your goals and wellbeing.
Coaching or mentoring can support your wellbeing and performance.
I can explain options and how to access them.
Health & Safety concerns should be reported promptly. I can explain how to report safely.
If there’s immediate danger, follow emergency procedures.
Work incidents or injuries should be recorded via the H&S process.
I can signpost the form and who to notify.
For vaccination or flu‑jab guidance, I can share internal signposting and support options.
Let me know what you need and I’ll point you in the right direction.
We can schedule a quick wellbeing check‑in with a welfare officer.
Would you like a short call or a full appointment?
I can note a reminder for your wellbeing appointment or follow‑up.
Tell me the time window you prefer.
No problem — let’s start fresh. What would you like help with: wellbeing, HR, financial, adjustments, or contact?
You can also type a few words (e.g., ‘stress’, ‘money’, ‘leave’, ‘adjustments’).
Main options: Wellbeing, HR (leave/policy), Financial/Hardship, Adjustments, Contact Welfare.
Tell me which one you need, or type a few words describing your situation.
I’m not sure I understood. I can connect you with the welfare team or show the help menu.
Would you like a callback or to see options?
If you need language or interpreter support, I can arrange signposting or a welfare contact.
Tell me your preferred language and we’ll find the best option.
